column1: Kata Robata////There was no wait for Saturday lunch and we were seated immediately upon walking in. We only went for the Nagasaki noodle and ordered right away! The broth was on point
column2: with so many different kinds of seafood and chashu being mixed together
column3: it was so savory and full of flavor. (Note that they also put a lot of ginger in the noodle
column4: so if you don't like the taste of it
column5: ask for it to be taken out when you order). The noodle was cooked perfectly and everything was perfect
